rows.label: tev000295_MSG0001
rows.name:
Ah, my dear friend [ST:playername ].
We suspected this might pick your curiosity.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0002
rows.name:
After all, how could anyone possibly fail to notice
such a splendid exercise routine?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_JNK0010
rows.name: Inquire

rows.label: tev000295_SEL0011
rows.name: Ask what exercises L is doing.

rows.label: tev000295_JNK0020
rows.name: Implore

rows.label: tev000295_SEL0021
rows.name: Insist that L teach you his exercise routine.

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0003
rows.name: A perfectly reasonable question![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0004
rows.name:
This is a hybrid exercise program of our own creation.
Its foundation is a daily Japanese calisthenics routine,
which Secretary Nagi has kindly taught to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0005
rows.name:
But we have also incorporated elements of Nopon
gymnastics, as well as movements taken from the
Prone coming-of-age dance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0006
rows.name: And what was the genesis of this inspired mélange?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0007
rows.name:
Merely that New LA is a city of many species living
together, and yet there is no common exercise routine
to unite us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0008
rows.name:
We're confident that you, of all people, will appreciate
the initiative we took in finding a solution to this
most vexing of problems.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0009
rows.name:
We never cease to be amazed by your ability to
intuitively grasp the truths that lesser minds resist,
[ST:playername ].[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0010
rows.name: Truly, you are no average human.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0011
rows.name:
This is a hybrid exercise program of our own creation.
Its foundation is a daily Japanese calisthenics routine,
which Secretary Nagi has kindly taught to us.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0012
rows.name:
But we have also incorporated elements of Nopon
gymnastics, as well as movements taken from the
Prone coming-of-age dance.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0013
rows.name: And what was the genesis of this inspired mélange?[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0014
rows.name:
Merely that New LA is a city of many species living
together, and yet there is no common exercise routine
to unite us![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0015
rows.name:
We saw the void and took it upon ourself to fill it.
We have never been one to resist destiny's trumpet,
after all.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0016
rows.name: It would please us to no end to have your endorsement.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_JNK0030
rows.name: Endorse

rows.label: tev000295_SEL0031
rows.name: Commend L for his impressive exercise routine.

rows.label: tev000295_JNK0040
rows.name: Refuse

rows.label: tev000295_SEL0041
rows.name: Shame L for his embarrassing exercise routine.

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0017
rows.name: You honor us, my friend. This is high praise indeed.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0018
rows.name:
It was too much to hope that all the xenoforms of NLA
would line up to join us as soon as they witnessed our
bold display.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0019
rows.name:
But now that we have a partner of such lofty stature,
all will be well.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0020
rows.name:
We are confident that our combined efforts of public
outreach will win over the city twice as quickly![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0021
rows.name:
Slow and steady may win the race,
but two turtles are faster than one![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0022
rows.name: Wha... What?![ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0023
rows.name:
We had taken you for a visionary! We never imagined
that you would react exactly as Secretary Nagi did.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0024
rows.name:
This is most unfortunate. It is clear you are intrigued
and fascinated by our routine, yet still you fear to
attempt it yourself.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0025
rows.name:
Heed our words, friend—you are gazing upon the
future of NLA.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0026
rows.name:
Within a year, the majority of New LA's population,
xenoforms included, will be joining us in our morning
calisthenics program.[ST:wait ]

rows.label: tev000295_MSG0027
rows.name:
We hope your rash words of today will not stop you
from admitting your error in the future. There will
always be a spot for you beside us![ST:wait ]
